name: DEATHGARDEN - Terminator Set
detailed_description: The TERMINATOR Set for Deathgarden introduces a cosmetic Set for the Hunter inspired by the iconic movie franchise. As the Hunter, you can now enter the garden with the legendary T-800 Complete Set (Weapon skin, Mask and Outfit).
about_the_game: The TERMINATOR Set for Deathgarden introduces a cosmetic Set for the Hunter inspired by the iconic movie franchise. As the Hunter, you can now enter the garden with the legendary T-800 Complete Set (Weapon skin, Mask and Outfit).
short_description: The TERMINATOR Set for Deathgarden introduces a cosmetic Set for the Hunter inspired by the iconic movie franchise. As the Hunter, you can now enter the garden with the legendary T-800 Complete Set (Weapon skin, Mask and Outfit).
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Mínimos:
  • SO: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, x64
  • Processador: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX-8120 Eight-Core
  • Memória: 8 GB de RAM
  • Placa de vídeo: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon HD 7970 / R9 280 X
  • DirectX: Versão 11
  • Rede: Conexão de internet banda larga
  • Armazenamento: 20 GB de espaço disponível

content_descriptors.notes: Deathgarden is an action game in which players engage in multiplayer matches as either a hunter or one of five runners. Runners emit splashes of blood when attacked. As the hunter, players must find the runners, from a first-person perspective, before they escape. Hunters can use various fire weapons to injure or kill the runners.
